data.title: #PAGetaway
data.meta_description: Visit Pennsylvania. Find information on places to stay, things to do, trip ideas, destinations and deals and events in PA. Travel to Pennsylvania today!
data.text:
Make Your Summer Getaway to Pennsylvania

This summer, find outdoor adventure on a wooded bike trail or Class IV rapids. Time travel on a historic street or battlefield. Visit vibrant cities. Savor the eclectic food scene. Or take family adventures to new heights. Whatever the getaway, you can find it in PA.

Image

PA's streams are teeming with trout.

With 86,000 miles of streams, PA is an angler's dream. Plan your guys trip or plan your weekend getaway!

Image

PA ballparks are a homerun!

There's nothing like a day at the ball game. Get your friends and fam together and catch a game in PA.

Get Inspired

View All Articles

Image

Good Times Are Brewing Here

With more than 500 craft breweries across Pennsylvania, you could say we know a thing or two about what makes a good brew.

Image

The Keystone to America's Birthday

Get ready to party! The 250th anniversary, or the “Semiquincentennial,” of this great nation will soon be here and PA is at the center of it all.

Getaway inspo sent straight to your mailbox or inbox.

Request a Travel Guide

PA Travel Newsletter

We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website. If you continue to use our website, we will assume that you are happy to receive all cookies (and milk!) from visitPA.com. Learn more about cookie data in our Privacy Policy
